title: [K-12] Mobile-Based Short-Intensive Rhythmic Gymnastics Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic calisthenics movements and experience with mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Utilization of mobile learning content to establish safe contactless learning environments during the COVID-19 pandemic

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic rhythmic gymnastics movements (jump, rotation, balance maintenance) with 80% accuracy via a mobile platform.
Learners practice self-directed learning by filming and submitting rhythmic gymnastics practice videos at least three times a week using an LMS system.
Learners improve the precision of gymnastics movements (arm movement accuracy) by 75% or more in real time using interactive features of mobile devices.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
